section:
MainMenuPageBehavior Class Reference MainMenuPageBehavior
Page that contains the 4 buttons, not much to do here, here we should for now load all the attacks of the characters, we do this because we know that when then game gets to the main menu theoeretically all the models should be loaded.

Detailed Description
Page that contains the 4 buttons, not much to do here, here we should for now load all the attacks of the characters, we do this because we know that when then game gets to the main menu theoeretically all the models should be loaded.
in the figma there is a leaderboard component, that should be called here
